{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3434598,"name":"Eren Orhun","username":"erenorhun","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erenorhun/{size}/203650_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T16:21:08.794Z","cooked":"

During build season, we used a HUGE amount of grease to keep our swerve modules run smoothly. however due to hairs and dusts on our carpet, they are dirty now. What is the best way to clean this extra grease off our gears.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T16:21:08.794Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":92,"reads":303,"readers_count":302,"score":535.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Eren Orhun","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55838,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/1","custom_user_title":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3434626,"name":"Patrick","username":"Patrick3357","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/patrick3357/{size}/169915_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:13:41.407Z","cooked":"

WD-40 a toothbrush or small wire brush and time.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:13:41.407Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":287,"readers_count":286,"score":92.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Patrick","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52597,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Build mentor"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/2","custom_user_title":"Build mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434629,"name":"Eren Orhun","username":"erenorhun","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erenorhun/{size}/203650_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:20:10.319Z","cooked":"

time for grease to dissolve or time for brushing? and how much time to be exact

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:20:10.319Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":282,"readers_count":281,"score":66.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Eren Orhun","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":52597,"username":"Patrick3357","name":"Patrick","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/patrick3357/{size}/169915_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55838,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/3","custom_user_title":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434632,"name":"Patrick","username":"Patrick3357","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/patrick3357/{size}/169915_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:28:11.603Z","cooked":"

Brushing mostly, If you’re lucky and all the debris is loose you’ll be able to get it all off quickly, you might even get away with blowing it out using compressed air without taking the modules apart. If you’ve gotten tape residue or other sticky stuff in the teeth its probably best to spray down the gears with WD-40 or leave them in a bath of citrus oil or another solvent for an hour then brush or scrape out every tooth. One of our mentors periodically takes home a bag of gears and cleans them while watching TV. (Thanks Chris!)

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:28:11.603Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":266,"readers_count":265,"score":78.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Patrick","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":55838,"username":"erenorhun","name":"Eren Orhun","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erenorhun/{size}/203650_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52597,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Build mentor"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/4","custom_user_title":"Build mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434633,"name":"AllenGregoryIV","username":"AllenGregoryIV","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/allengregoryiv/{size}/65531_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:32:55.104Z","cooked":"

When we do a full swerve rebuild we also use a small ultrasonic cleaner on the swerve parts. After cleaning off all the large amounts of grease we leave them in the ultrasonic cleaner for a couple hours.

Do you have a spesific reason to use ultrasonic cleaner

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:41:49.007Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":226,"readers_count":225,"score":55.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Eren Orhun","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":10647,"username":"AllenGregoryIV","name":"AllenGregoryIV","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/allengregoryiv/{size}/65531_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55838,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/6","custom_user_title":"Excessive Loctite Enjoyer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434646,"name":"Ares Tan","username":"Nvertd","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nvertd/{size}/234441_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:48:22.493Z","cooked":"

Ultrasonic cleaner with kerosene.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:48:22.493Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":218,"readers_count":217,"score":58.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Ares Tan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":47881,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/7","custom_user_title":"Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434650,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T17:50:31.400Z","cooked":"
erenorhun:

Do you have a specific reason to use ultrasonic cleaner

Enlightened laziness?

It’s a pretty good way to remove small residue with the human effort of 15 seconds of button pushing and 30-60 minutes of waiting instead of an hour of fiddling with a toothbrush to do a less thorough job.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T17:50:31.400Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":211,"readers_count":210,"score":122.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Jim Sokoloff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66298,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"97 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/8","custom_user_title":"97 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434707,"name":"Emilio Parra","username":"Emilio","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emilio/{size}/197052_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T19:09:52.634Z","cooked":"
sokoloff:

Enlightened laziness?

The biggest reason we used the ultrasonic cleaner during the rebuild was that we wanted to get every part really clean, removing all the gunk from every gear tooth and hard-to-reach spot. It made refurbishing the modules way faster and saved us a lot of time.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T19:09:52.634Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":194,"readers_count":193,"score":143.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Emilio Parra","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":55838,"username":"erenorhun","name":"Eren Orhun","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erenorhun/{size}/203650_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":42196,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847 & Photon 8515"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/9","custom_user_title":"Engineering Coach - Spectrum 3847 & Photon 8515","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3434712,"name":"Dominick Ferone","username":"Dominick_Ferone","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dominick_ferone/{size}/236622_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-14T19:14:21.760Z","cooked":"

I’ve used a wire brush (maybe it was a file brush?) and brake cleaner to clean up tons of gearboxes. (We used the wrong grease for a few seasons and needed to deep clean)

Leaving them soaking in a little container with the brake clean for a few minutes, wipe with a paper towel, and then brush between the teeth had high success.

Then I’d set them on paper towels to dry for a little bit. (This was mostly done at competition, otherwise I’d probably use a compressor to try and blow the excessive brake clean off/speed up drying.)

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-14T19:14:21.760Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":188,"readers_count":187,"score":37.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Dominick Ferone","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19411,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"353/358 Mentor - Formerly 5030/9016 "},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/10","custom_user_title":"353/358 Mentor - Formerly 5030/9016 ","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3442047,"name":"Drew Williams","username":"jreneew2","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jreneew2/{size}/135239_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-31T11:09:59.627Z","cooked":"

Do you have a recommendation for a machine and what kind of cleaner/ degreaser you used with it?

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-31T11:09:59.627Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":137,"readers_count":136,"score":42.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Drew Williams","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":42196,"username":"Emilio","name":"Emilio Parra","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emilio/{size}/197052_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21777,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":" I moved to California just for districts"},"post_url":"/t/best-way-to-clean-excess-grease/473002/11","custom_user_title":" I moved to California just for districts","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3442303,"name":"Emilio Parra","username":"Emilio","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emilio/{size}/197052_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-31T20:38:35.316Z","cooked":"

We purchased a jewelry ultrasonic cleaner with positive reviews that has since disapeared. Here’s an alternative option from the same seller: Amazon.com. While we didn’t anticipate achieving sterility or exceptionally clean results, it outperformed any manual cleaning method we tried. We experimented with various cleaning solutions, including soapy water and Simplegreen.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":12,"updated_at":"2024-10-31T20:38:51.593Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":11,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":79,"readers_count":78,"score":65.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":473002,"topic_slug":"best-way-to-clean-excess-grease","display_username":"Emilio Parra","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B1D3VBCQ/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":24}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":21777,"username":"jreneew2","name":"Drew Williams","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jreneew2/{size}/135239_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":42196,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Engineering Coach -
